mapper.select: select a.FNO as feedNo , a.PNO as projectNo , a.EMAIL , a.CONTENT , a.REG_DATE as regDate , a.MNAME as name , a.LEVEL as prjMembLevel , a.FEEDURL as feedUrl , b.IMGURL as photoUrl from ( select a.FNO, a.PNO, a.EMAIL, a.CONTENT, a.REG_DATE, a.feedUrl, c.MNAME, b.LEVEL from SPMS_FEEDS a , SPMS_PRJMEMB b , SPMS_MEMBS c where 1=1 and a.PNO = b.PNO and a.EMAIL = b.EMAIL and b.EMAIL = c.EMAIL and a.PNO = #{value} ) a left join SPMS_MEMIMG b on a.EMAIL = b.EMAIL order by a.FNO desc

select a.FNO as feedNo , a.PNO as projectNo , a.EMAIL , a.CONTENT , a.REG_DATE as regDate , b.IMGURL as photoUrl , c.mname as name , c.level as prjMembLevel from spms_feeds a, spms_memimg b, spms_membs c where a.email=b.email and b.email=c.email order by a.FNO desc;
mapper.insert: insert into SPMS_FEEDS (CONTENT, REG_DATE, EMAIL, PNO, feedUrl) values (#{content}, now(), #{email}, #{projectNo}, #{feedUrl});
